DOC.brief_summary: This is a retrospective observational study of patients who have taken a regimen containing DRV / c at least 24 weeks prior to study initiation
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Effectiveness and Safety of Darunavir/Cobicistat (DRV/c) Containing Regimens in Routine Clinical Practice
DOC.detailed_description: The study will include 750 patients and will record data at 24 weeks. The study will also record data at 48 weeks for those patients whom these data are available
DOC.criteria: Patients with HIV infection Inform consent document. To have initiated therapy containing DRV / c and have a followup of at least 24 Weeks. Not having evaluable clinical data of the patient Patients not routinely followed in the center Patient less than 18 years of age.
